name: Archbishop Simon Karisa
title: Archbishop
bio: Archbishop  Simon Karisa has served the PCOF fellowship since 2010. He previously pastored several congregations and has a passion for church planting, pastoral training and community outreach.

name: Bishop Wilkins Folonzi
title: Assistant Chairman-National
bio: Rev. Grace coordinates national operations, communications and training programs across our network of churches.

name: Bishop Japhet Mwambire
title: General Secretary
bio: Bishop Japhet coordinates national operations, communications and training programs across our network of churches.

name: Bishop Charles Ngure
title: Assistant Genaral Secretary
bio: Helps the General Secretary in coordinating national operations, communications and training programs across our network of churches.

name: Bishop John Kombe
title: Treasurer
bio: Bishop John Kombe oversees PCOF financial stewardship, donor reporting and compliance. He manages budgets for national programs and church support initiatives.

name: Bishop James Gachaui
title: Assistant Treasurer
bio: Bishop James assists the Treasurer in managing PCOF finances, ensuring transparency and accountability across all church activities.

name: Bishop John Ndoro
title: Regional Overseer -Tana Delta branch
bio: Bishop John Ndoro oversees PCOF churches in Tana-River, providing pastoral support, leadership training and church planting initiatives in the region.

name: Apostle Nicodemus Karisa
title: Chairman - Ministry Administration Board
bio: Nicodemus Karisa oversees the Ministry Administration Board, ensuring effective governance and strategic oversight of PCOF's ministry operations.

name: Rev. Eric Thuva
title: Secretary - Ministry Administration Board
bio: Rev. Eric Thuva supports the Ministry Administration Board by managing communications, documentation and coordination of board activities.

name: Pastor Daniel Mae
title: Member - Ministry Administration Board
bio: Pastor Daniel Mae contributes to the Ministry Administration Board by providing insights on church growth, pastoral care and community engagement.

name: Bishop Ngari
title: Regional Overseer - Kilifi Branch
bio: Bishop Ngari leads PCOF churches in Kilifi Kenya, focusing on discipleship, community outreach and leadership development.

name: Rev. Abednego Chenje
title: Regional Overseer -Bamba branch
bio: Bishop Moses supervises PCOF churches in Nairobi and Eastern Kenya, promoting urban ministry, youth engagement and church growth strategies.

name: Rev. Albert Kingi
title: Regional Overseer -Malindi branch
bio: Rev Albert leads PCOF churches in the Coast of Kenya in Malindi, emphasizing evangelism, church planting and community development.

name: Rev. Daniel Singwaya
title: Regional Overseer -Sabaki branch
bio: Rev. Daniel leads PCOF churches along the Coast of Sabaki Region & Lower Eastern Kenya, emphasizing evangelism, church planting and community development.
